creditline: National Museum of the American Indian
department: Art of Africa and the Americas
description: man's shirt; decorated with dyed quillwork; hide fringe and cloth neck; four wide panels of quillwork, two over shoulders and one down each sleeve; symmetrical design patterns of diamonds in yellow, green, magenta and purple
medium: Native-tanned hide, dyed quills, glass beads, wool cloth, cotton cloth, sinew, cotton thread
title: Shirt
